item.title: [DELTA] Welcome message HELP! [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

Hey guys, my sever is delta, 317.

Currently this is my normal welcome message that pops up into the chatbox when a user logs in:

how do i make it come up in a scroll-like thing like this?:

my base is 317 - Delta

here is a snippit of my code for my normal welcome message:

[code]getTotalLevel();
specAttack();
l33thax(12323);
l33thax(7574);
l33thax(7599);
l33thax(7549);
l33thax(8493);
l33thax(7499);
sM(“Welcome to RadiationScape!”);
sM("@red@Remember to register on the forums!");
sM("@blu@Do ::forum for more info!");
sM("@yel@Latest Update: 2 new commands -@or3@ ::fightpits & ::jad");

checkDupe();
server.special.loginSpec(this, playerEquipment[playerWeapon]);
if(absX >= 2997 && absX <= 2998 && absY >= 3917 && absY <= 3917){
toX = 2998;
toY = 3931;
}[/code]

can someone please help?! thanks!
